画像資料: (がぞうしりょう) - image data; documents incorporating images
画力: (がりょく) - drawing ability; skill at art
画商: (がしょう) - picture dealer; commercial art gallery
画境: (がきょう) - feeling or atmosphere or mood of a painting; the mood to paint
画師: (がし) - painter; artist; painter supported by patron
画廊: (garou) - art gallery (especialmente obras de arte à venda), picture gallery
画房: (がぼう) - artist's studio; workshop; studio; atelier
画材: (がざい) - subject matter of a painting; art supplies/art materials
画板: (がばん) - drawing board; drafting board; draughting board
画楼: (がろう) - high decorated building; picture-perfect mansion/stately home that looks as if it were from a painting
画法: (がほう) - art of drawing and painting
画眉鳥: (ホホジロ) - meadow bunting (species of passerine, Emberiza cioides); (頬白 only)   great white shark/white pointer (Carcharodon carcharias)
画竜: (がりゅう) - drawn dragon; painted dragon
画竜天睛: (がりゅうてんせい) - (yoji) finishing touch; completing (something) by executing the final, critical step
画竜点睛: (がりゅうてんせい) - (yoji) finishing touch; completing (something) by executing the final, critical step
画策: (かくさく) - plan; scheme; program formulation; programme formulation; maneuver; manoeuvre
画素: (がそ) - picture element; image pixel; PEL
画素進行方向: (がそしんこうほうこう) - pel path
画蛇添足: (がだてんそく) - (yoji) making an unnecessary addition (to); gilding the lily
画角: (がかく) - angle of view (rel. to cameras)
画調: (がちょう) - tone of an image
画談: (がだん) - discussions on art and painting
画讃: (がさん) - legend over a picture; inscription (legend, writing) on a painting
画讚: (がさん) - legend over a picture; inscription (legend, writing) on a painting
画賛: (がさん) - legend over a picture; inscription (legend, writing) on a painting
画鋲: (がびょう) - drawing pin; thumb tack
画集: (がしゅう) - book of paintings in print
画面: (gamen) - screen (de uma TV, computador, etc.); image (on a screen), picture, scene , screen (of a TV, computer, etc.); image (on a screen), picture, scene; surface of a painting (picture, drawing, etc.)
画面中央: (がめんちゅうおう) - middle of the screen
画餅: (がへい) - failure; fiasco; rice-cake painting; collapse; something of little value
画龍点睛: (がりゅうてんせい) - (yoji) finishing touch; completing (something) by executing the final, critical step
界: (kai) - world , kingdom; erathem (camada de rocha correspondente à era em que foi depositada); partition of land; the world of (some category)
界標: (かいひょう) - boundary mark (on land or water)
界面張力: (かいめんちょうりょく) - interfacial tension
界面活性: (かいめんかっせい) - surface active
界面活性剤: (かいめんかっせいざい) - surfactant
界面現象: (かいめんげんしょう) - interfacial phenomenon; surface phenomenon
